Detailed Description

Routines to handle asterisms.

Function Documentation

static long comb_select ( long  n,
long  k 
) [static]

Computes the number of possibilities of selection k items from n items . 

00034                                        {
00035     //number of possibilities of selecting k from n.
00036     if(k>n||k<0) {
00037     error("Invalid argument\n");
00038     return -1;
00039     } else {
00040     //compute factorial(n)/factorial(n-k) will overflow if n>=21
00041     //we use double
00042     double res=1;
00043     long nk=n-k;
00044     while(n>nk){
00045         res*=n--;
00046     }
00047     double fk=1;
00048     while(k>1){
00049         fk*=k--;
00050     }
00051     return (long)round(res/fk);
00052     }// return factorial(n)/(factorial(k)*factorial(n-k));
00053 }

static int comb_next ( int *  comb,
long  n,
long  k 
) [static]

Find the next combination. 

00067                                                {
00068     if(n<1 || k<1){
00069     return 0;
00070     }
00071     int i = k-1;
00072     comb[i]++;//increment to next
00073     while(comb[i]+k>= n+i+1 && i>0){//out of range, increment previous one
00074     i--;
00075     comb[i]++;
00076     }
00077     if(comb[0] + k > n){
00078     return 0;//no more
00079     }
00080     for(i=i+1; i<k; i++){
00081     comb[i]=comb[i-1]+1;
00082     }
00083     return 1;
00084 }

ASTER_S* setup_aster_comb ( int *  naster,
int  nstar,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

Create combination of stars to form asterism.

It has the option to put TTF always on the brightest for testing purpose. 

00089                                                                        {
00090     if(nstar==0){
00091     *naster=0;
00092     return NULL;
00093     }
00094     int ncomb=1;
00095     ASTER_S *aster;
00096     int npowfs=parms->skyc.npowfs;
00097     int nwfs[npowfs];
00098     int nleft;
00099     int nwfstot=0;
00100     nleft=nstar;
00101     for(int ipowfs=0; ipowfs<npowfs; ipowfs++){
00102     if(nleft>=parms->skyc.nwfsmax[ipowfs]){
00103         nwfs[ipowfs]=parms->skyc.nwfsmax[ipowfs];
00104     }else{
00105         nwfs[ipowfs]=nleft;
00106     }
00107     nwfstot+=nwfs[ipowfs];
00108     ncomb*=comb_select(nleft,nwfs[ipowfs]);
00109     nleft-=nwfs[ipowfs];
00110     }
00111     if(parms->skyc.ttfbrightest){
00112     if(parms->maos.msa[0]==2){
00113         ncomb/=comb_select(nwfstot,nwfs[0]);
00114     }else{
00115         error("Please revise\n");
00116     }
00117     }
00118     if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00119     info2("Number of stars: %d, number of asterisms: %d\n", nstar, ncomb);
00120     }
00121     aster=calloc(ncomb, sizeof(ASTER_S));
00122     int count=0;
00123     int *comb=comb_init(nwfstot);
00124     do{
00125     if(npowfs==1){
00126         aster[count].nwfs=nwfs[0];
00127         aster[count].wfs=calloc(nwfs[0], sizeof(WFS_S));
00128         aster[count].iaster=count;
00129         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<nwfs[0]; iwfs++){
00130         aster[count].wfs[iwfs].istar=comb[iwfs];
00131         aster[count].wfs[iwfs].ipowfs=0;
00132         }
00133         count++;
00134     }else if(npowfs==2){
00135         int mask[nwfstot];
00136         int *comb2=comb_init(nwfs[0]);
00137         do{
00138         memset(mask, 0, sizeof(int)*nwfstot);
00139         aster[count].nwfs=nwfstot;
00140         aster[count].wfs=calloc(nwfstot, sizeof(WFS_S));
00141         aster[count].iaster=count;
00142         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<nwfs[0]; iwfs++){
00143             aster[count].wfs[iwfs].ipowfs=0;
00144             aster[count].wfs[iwfs].istar=comb[comb2[iwfs]];
00145             mask[comb2[iwfs]]=1;
00146         }
00147         int jstar=0;
00148         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<nwfs[1]; iwfs++){
00149             aster[count].wfs[iwfs+nwfs[0]].ipowfs=1;
00150             while(mask[jstar]) jstar++;
00151             aster[count].wfs[iwfs+nwfs[0]].istar=comb[jstar];
00152             mask[jstar]=1;
00153         }
00154         count++;
00155         }while(comb_next(comb2,nwfstot,nwfs[0]) && !parms->skyc.ttfbrightest);
00156         free(comb2);
00157     }
00158     }while(comb_next(comb,nstar,nwfstot));
00159     free(comb);
00160     if(count!=ncomb){
00161     warning("ncomb=%d, count=%d. They should equal.\n", ncomb, count);
00162     }
00163     *naster=count;
00164     return aster;
00165 }

static dmat* calc_recon_error ( const dmat *  pgm,
const dmat *  ineam,
const dmat *  mcc 
) [static]

Estimate wavefront error propagated from measurement error.

pgm is the reconstructor. ineam is the error inverse.

Parameters:
[in] pgm the reconstructor
[in] ineam the inverse of error covariance matrix
[in] mcc NGS mode covariance matrix. 
00240                    {
00241     dsp *neasp=spnewdiag(ineam->nx, ineam->p, 1);
00242     dmat *psp=NULL;
00243     dmat *tmp=NULL;
00244     dmulsp(&tmp,pgm,neasp, 1);
00245     spfree(neasp);
00246     dmm(&psp,tmp,pgm,"nt",1);
00247     dfree(tmp); 
00248     PDMAT(psp,ppsp); 
00249     PDMAT(mcc,pmcc);
00250 
00251     double rss=0;
00252     for(int ix=0; ix<psp->nx; ix++){
00253     for(int iy=0; iy<psp->ny; iy++){
00254         rss+=ppsp[iy][ix]*pmcc[ix][iy];
00255     }
00256     }
00257     double rsstt=0;
00258     for(int ix=0; ix<2; ix++){
00259     for(int iy=0; iy<2; iy++){
00260         rsstt+=ppsp[iy][ix]*pmcc[ix][iy];
00261     }
00262     }
00263     dfree(psp);
00264     dmat *res=dnew(2,1);
00265     res->p[0]=rss;
00266     res->p[1]=rsstt;
00267     return res;
00268 }

void setup_aster_recon ( ASTER_S *  aster,
STAR_S *  star,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

Setup the reconstructor for each ASTER_S.

  • is the reconstructor.

  • is the measurement error covariance matrix. Inclue both the measurement error and tilt anisoplanatism effects (computed as the variance of noise free gradient on PSFs that have ideal NGS compensation

  • is the NGS mode to gradient operator. 
00283                                                                           {
00284     int ndtrat=parms->skyc.ndtrat;
00285     if(aster->pgm){
00286     dcellfree(aster->pgm);
00287     dcellfree(aster->pgmtt);
00288     dcellfree(aster->sigman);
00289     dcellfree(aster->nea_tot);
00290     }
00291     aster->pgm=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00292     aster->pgmtt=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00293     aster->sigman=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00294     aster->nea_tot=dcellnew(aster->nwfs,ndtrat);
00295     PDCELL(aster->nea_tot,nea_tot);
00296     if(parms->skyc.demote){
00297     aster->sigmantt=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00298     }
00299     for(int idtrat=0; idtrat<ndtrat; idtrat++){
00300     int dtrat=parms->skyc.dtrats[idtrat];
00301     dcell *nea=dcellnew(aster->nwfs, 1);
00302     dcell *neatt=dcellnew(aster->nwfs, 1);
00303     for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00304         const int istar=aster->wfs[iwfs].istar;
00305         const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00306         nea->p[iwfs]=ddup(aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->sanea->p[idtrat]);//in rad
00307         dcwpow(nea->p[iwfs], 2);//rad^2.
00308         if(parms->skyc.gradnea){
00309         dadd(&nea->p[iwfs], 1, star[istar].pistat[ipowfs].gnea->p[idtrat], 1);
00310         if(!star[istar].pistat[ipowfs].gnea->p[idtrat]){
00311             error("gnea is empty\n");
00312         }
00313         }
00314         const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00315         if(nsa==1){
00316         neatt->p[iwfs]=dref(nea->p[iwfs]);
00317         }else{
00318         neatt->p[iwfs]=dnew(2,1);
00319         for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00320             neatt->p[iwfs]->p[0]+=nea->p[iwfs]->p[isa];
00321             neatt->p[iwfs]->p[1]+=nea->p[iwfs]->p[isa+nsa];
00322         }
00323         neatt->p[iwfs]->p[0]/=nsa*nsa;
00324         neatt->p[iwfs]->p[1]/=nsa*nsa;
00325         }
00326         nea_tot[idtrat][iwfs]=ddup(nea->p[iwfs]);//in rad^2
00327         dcwpow(nea_tot[idtrat][iwfs],0.5);//in rad
00328     }
00329     
00330     dmat *neam=dcell2m(nea); 
00331     dcellfree(nea); 
00332     dcwpow(neam, -1);
00333     dmat *neattm=dcell2m(neatt); 
00334     dcellfree(neatt);
00335     dcwpow(neattm, -1);
00336     //Reconstructor
00337     aster->pgm->p[idtrat]=dpinv(aster->gm, neam,NULL);
00338     if(aster->nwfs>2 && parms->skyc.demote){
00339         //Demote TTF to tt.
00340         dmat *pgmtt=dpinv(aster->gmtt, neattm,NULL);
00341         dmm(&aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat], pgmtt, aster->dettf, "nn",1); dfree(pgmtt);
00342         //Replace the plate scale mode reconstructor from pgm.
00343         for(int iy=0; iy<aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat]->ny; iy++){
00344         for(int ix=2; ix<aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat]->nx; ix++){
00345             int ind=ix+iy*aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat]->nx;
00346             aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat]->p[ind]=aster->pgm->p[idtrat]->p[ind];
00347         }
00348         }
00349     }
00350     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00351         dwrite(neam,  "%s/aster%d_neam_dtrat%d",dirsetup,aster->iaster,dtrat);
00352         dwrite(neattm,"%s/aster%d_neattm_dtrat%d",dirsetup,aster->iaster,dtrat);
00353     }
00354     dcwpow(neam, -1); //inverse of Measurement error.
00355     //sigman is error due to noise.
00356     aster->sigman->p[idtrat]=calc_recon_error(aster->pgm->p[idtrat],neam,parms->maos.mcc);
00357     if(aster->nwfs>2 && parms->skyc.demote){
00358         aster->sigmantt->p[idtrat]
00359         =calc_recon_error(aster->pgmtt->p[idtrat],neam,parms->maos.mcc);
00360     }
00361     dfree(neam);
00362     }   
00363     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00364     dcellwrite(aster->g,"%s/aster%d_g",dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00365     dwrite(aster->gm,   "%s/aster%d_gm",dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00366     dwrite(aster->gmtt, "%s/aster%d_gmtt",dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00367     dcellwrite(aster->pgm,    "%s/aster%d_pgm", dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00368     dcellwrite(aster->pgm,    "%s/aster%d_pgm", dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00369     dcellwrite(aster->pgmtt,  "%s/aster%d_pgmtt", dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00370     dcellwrite(aster->nea_tot,  "%s/aster%d_nea_tot", dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00371     dcellwrite(aster->sigman, "%s/aster%d_sigman", dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00372     }
00373 }

void setup_aster_servo ( SIM_S *  simu,
ASTER_S *  aster,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

Optimize type II servo gains beased on measurement noise and signal PSD.

We try to minimize 

00381                                                                          {
00382     //Focus tracking error?
00383     int ndtrat=parms->skyc.ndtrat;
00384     if(aster->gain){
00385     dcellfree(aster->gain);
00386     dfree(aster->res_ws);
00387     dfree(aster->res_ngs);
00388     }
00389     aster->gain=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00390     aster->res_ws=dnew(ndtrat,1);
00391     aster->res_ngs=dnew(ndtrat,3);
00392     PDMAT(aster->res_ngs, pres_ngs);
00393     dmat *psd_ngs_ws= simu->psd_ngs_ws;
00394     dmat *psd_tt_ws = simu->psd_tt_ws;
00395     dmat *psd_ps    = simu->psd_ps;
00396     for(int idtrat=0; idtrat<ndtrat; idtrat++){
00397     int dtrat=parms->skyc.dtrats[idtrat];
00398     double sigma_ngs= aster->sigman->p[idtrat]->p[0];
00399     double sigma_tt = aster->sigman->p[idtrat]->p[1];
00400     double sigma_ps = sigma_ngs-sigma_tt;
00401     double res_ngs;//residual error due to signal after servo rejection.
00402     double res_ngsn;//residual error due to noise.
00403     long nmod=parms->maos.nmod;
00404     aster->gain->p[idtrat]=dnew(3,nmod);
00405     PDMAT(aster->gain->p[idtrat], pgain);
00406     if(parms->skyc.gsplit){
00407         double res_tt, res_ttn, res_ps, res_psn;
00408         dmat *g_tt=servo_typeII_optim(&res_tt,&res_ttn,psd_tt_ws, 1./(parms->maos.dt*dtrat),
00409                       parms->maos.dt,sigma_tt);
00410         dmat *g_ps=servo_typeII_optim(&res_ps,&res_psn,psd_ps, 1./(parms->maos.dt*dtrat),
00411                       parms->maos.dt,sigma_ps);
00412         res_ngs  = res_tt + res_ps;
00413         res_ngsn = res_ttn + res_psn;
00414         PDMAT(g_tt, pg_tt);
00415         PDMAT(g_ps, pg_ps);
00416         for(int imod=0; imod<nmod; imod++){
00417         if(imod<2){
00418             memcpy(pgain[imod], pg_tt, sizeof(double)*3);
00419         }else{
00420             memcpy(pgain[imod], pg_ps, sizeof(double)*3);
00421         }
00422         }
00423         dfree(g_tt); dfree(g_ps);
00424     }else{
00425         dmat *g_ngs=servo_typeII_optim(&res_ngs,&res_ngsn,psd_ngs_ws, 1./(parms->maos.dt*dtrat),
00426                        parms->maos.dt,sigma_ngs);
00427         PDMAT(g_ngs, pg_ngs);
00428         for(int imod=0; imod<nmod; imod++){
00429         memcpy(pgain[imod], pg_ngs, sizeof(double)*3);
00430         }
00431         dfree(g_ngs);
00432     }
00433     if(parms->skyc.noisefull){//use full noise
00434         pres_ngs[0][idtrat]=res_ngs+sigma_ngs;
00435     }else{// use filtered noise.
00436         pres_ngs[0][idtrat]=res_ngs+res_ngsn;//error due to signal and noise
00437     }
00438     pres_ngs[1][idtrat]=res_ngs;//error due to signal
00439     pres_ngs[2][idtrat]=res_ngsn;//error due to noise propagation.
00440 
00441     dmat *g_tt=dnew_ref(pgain[0],3,1);
00442     aster->res_ws->p[idtrat]=servo_typeII_residual(g_tt, parms->skyc.psd_ws, 
00443                                1./(parms->maos.dt*dtrat),
00444                                parms->maos.dt);
00445     dfree(g_tt);
00446     }
00447     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00448     dcellwrite(aster->gain,"%s/aster_gain",dirsetup);
00449     dwrite(aster->res_ws,"%s/aster_res_ws",dirsetup);
00450     dwrite(aster->res_ngs,"%s/aster_res_ngs",dirsetup);
00451     }
00452 }

)

Select a few asterisms that have decent performance (less than maxerror). 

00459                                                   {
00460  
00461     int ndtrat=parms->skyc.ndtrat;
00462     dmat *res=dnew(ndtrat, naster);
00463     PDMAT(res,pres);
00464     dmat *imin=dnew(2,naster);
00465     PDMAT(imin, pimin);
00466     int master=-1;
00467     double minimum=INFINITY;
00468     for(int iaster=0; iaster<naster; iaster++){
00469     double mini=INFINITY;
00470     for(int idtrat=0; idtrat<ndtrat; idtrat++){
00471         double rms= parms->skyc.resfocus->p[idtrat] 
00472         + aster[iaster].res_ws->p[idtrat]
00473         + aster[iaster].res_ngs->p[idtrat];
00474         pres[iaster][idtrat]=rms;
00475         if(rms<mini){
00476         mini=rms;
00477         aster[iaster].mdtrat=idtrat;
00478         aster[iaster].mresol=rms;
00479         }
00480     }
00481     pimin[iaster][0]=mini;
00482     pimin[iaster][1]=iaster;
00483     //Find upper and minimum good dtrats.
00484     for(int idtrat=aster[iaster].mdtrat; idtrat<ndtrat; idtrat++){
00485         if(pres[iaster][idtrat]<mini*2){
00486         aster[iaster].idtratmax=idtrat;
00487         }else{
00488         break;
00489         }
00490     }
00491     for(int idtrat=aster[iaster].mdtrat; idtrat>=0; idtrat--){
00492         if(pres[iaster][idtrat]<mini*4){
00493         aster[iaster].idtratmin=idtrat;
00494         }else{
00495         break;
00496         }
00497     }
00498     if(mini<minimum){
00499         master=iaster;
00500         minimum=mini;
00501     }
00502     }
00503     qsort(imin->p, naster, 2*sizeof(double),(int(*)(const void*,const void*))sortfun);
00504     result[0]=minimum;
00505     result[1]=parms->skyc.fss[aster[master].mdtrat];
00506     int count=0;
00507     if(minimum<maxerror){
00508     int taster=naster;
00509     if(parms->skyc.maxaster>0 && naster>parms->skyc.maxaster){
00510         taster=parms->skyc.maxaster;
00511     }
00512     for(int jaster=0; jaster<taster; jaster++){
00513         if(pimin[jaster][0]<minimum*2){
00514         count++;
00515         int iaster=(int)pimin[jaster][1];
00516         aster[iaster].use=1;//mark as valid.
00517         for(int iwfs=0; iwfs<aster[iaster].nwfs; iwfs++){
00518             int istar=aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].istar;
00519             int ipowfs=aster[iaster].wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00520             star[istar].use[ipowfs]=1;
00521         }
00522         }
00523     }
00524     }
00525     if(parms->skyc.verbose){
00526     info2("Minimum is found at aster %d at %.1f Hz: %.2f nm. Will evaluate %d asterisms.\n", 
00527           master,result[1],sqrt(minimum)*1e9, count);
00528     }
00529     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00530     dwrite(res, "%s/aster_resol",dirsetup);
00531     }
00532     dfree(res);
00533     dfree(imin);
00534   
00535 }

void setup_aster_regenpsf ( dmat *  mideal,
ASTER_S *  aster,
POWFS_S *  powfs,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

Regenerate PSF By doing ztilt simulations and compute the average PSF with this ztilt resigual NGS modes.

Todo:
record pistat during physical optics simulation and rerun them might help further! 
00541                                                                                             {
00542     dcell *mres=skysim_ztilt(mideal, aster, parms);
00543     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00544     dcellwrite(mres,"%s/mres_ztilt_aster%d",dirsetup,aster->iaster);
00545     }
00546     const long nwvl=parms->maos.nwvl;
00547     const long phystart=parms->skyc.phystart;
00548     dmat *mapply=NULL;
00549     for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00550     const double thetax=aster->wfs[iwfs].thetax;
00551     const double thetay=aster->wfs[iwfs].thetay;
00552     const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00553     const long ncomp=parms->maos.ncomp[ipowfs];
00554     cmat *wvf=cnew(ncomp,ncomp);
00555     cmat *wvfc=cnew(ncomp/2,ncomp/2);
00556     cfft2plan(wvf, -1);
00557     const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00558     if(!aster->wfs[iwfs].pistatref){
00559         free_pistat(aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat, 1, parms);
00560     }
00561     aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat=calloc(1, sizeof(PISTAT_S));
00562     aster->wfs[iwfs].pistatref=0;
00563     aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->psf=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00564     PDCELL(aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->psf, pistat);
00565     dmat *zgrad=dnew(2*nsa,1);
00566     for(long istep=phystart; istep<aster->nstep; istep++){
00567         PCCELL(aster->wfs[iwfs].wvfout[istep],wvfout);
00568         dmat *imres=mres->p[istep];
00569         dzero(zgrad);
00570         dmm(&zgrad, aster->g->p[iwfs], imres, "nn",1);
00571         dadd(&zgrad, 1, aster->wfs[iwfs].ztiltout->p[istep], 1);
00572         for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00573         dcp(&mapply, imres);
00574         mapply->p[0]-=zgrad->p[isa];
00575         mapply->p[1]-=zgrad->p[isa+nsa];
00576         for(long iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00577             double wvl=parms->maos.wvl[iwvl];
00578             ccp(&wvfc, wvfout[iwvl][isa]);
00579             ngsmod2wvf(wvfc, wvl, mapply,powfs[ipowfs].cloc[isa],
00580                    powfs[ipowfs].fpc[isa], 
00581                    thetax, thetay, parms);
00582             cembed(wvf,wvfc,0,C_FULL);
00583             cfft2(wvf,-1);
00584             cabs22d(&pistat[iwvl][isa], 1., wvf, 1.);
00585         }
00586         }
00587     }
00588     dfree(zgrad);
00589     //PSF peak in corner
00590     double pgrad[2];
00591     cmat *otf=cnew(ncomp,ncomp);
00592     cfft2plan(otf,1);
00593     cfft2plan(otf,-1);
00594     //Shift PSF so that the images are centered on FFT center.
00595     for(int i=0; i<nwvl*nsa; i++){
00596         dmat *psf=aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->psf->p[i];
00597         dfftshift(psf);//shift peak to center.
00598         double pmax=dmax(psf);
00599         dcog(pgrad,psf,0.5,0.5,0.1*pmax,0.1*pmax);
00600         dfftshift(psf);
00601         ccpd(&otf, psf);
00602         cfft2(otf,-1);
00603         ctilt(otf,-pgrad[0],-pgrad[1],0);
00604         cifft2(otf,1);
00605         creal2d(&psf,0,otf,1);
00606     }
00607     cfree(otf);
00608     dcellscale(aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->psf, 1./(aster->nstep-phystart));
00609 
00610     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00611         dcellwrite(aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat->psf, "%s/pistat_aster%d_wfs%ld",
00612                dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00613     }
00614 
00615     cfree(wvf); cfree(wvfc);
00616     }
00617     dfree(mapply);
00618     dcellfree(mres);
00619 }

void setup_aster_redomtch ( ASTER_S *  aster,
POWFS_S *  powfs,
const PARMS_S *  parms 
)

Compute matched filter from PSFs. 

00624                                                                                {  
00625     const long nwvl=parms->maos.nwvl;
00626     PDMAT(parms->skyc.rnefs,rnefs);
00627 
00628     for(long iwfs=0; iwfs<aster->nwfs; iwfs++){
00629     const int ipowfs=aster->wfs[iwfs].ipowfs;
00630     const long nsa=parms->maos.nsa[ipowfs];
00631     const long pixpsa=parms->skyc.pixpsa[ipowfs];
00632     PISTAT_S *pistat=aster->wfs[iwfs].pistat;
00633     pistat->i0=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00634     pistat->gx=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00635     pistat->gy=dcellnew(nsa,nwvl);
00636     
00637     pistat->i0s=dcellnew(nsa,1);
00638     pistat->gxs=dcellnew(nsa,1);
00639     pistat->gys=dcellnew(nsa,1);
00640     PDCELL(pistat->psf,psf);
00641     PDCELL(pistat->i0,i0);
00642     PDCELL(pistat->gx,gx);
00643     PDCELL(pistat->gy,gy);
00644 
00645     for(long iwvl=0; iwvl<nwvl; iwvl++){
00646         for(long isa=0; isa<nsa; isa++){
00647         i0[iwvl][isa]=dnew(pixpsa,pixpsa);
00648         gx[iwvl][isa]=dnew(pixpsa,pixpsa);
00649         gy[iwvl][isa]=dnew(pixpsa,pixpsa);
00650         //Next convert pistat psf to I0, gx, gy, and matched filter.
00651         psf2i0gxgy(i0[iwvl][isa],gx[iwvl][isa],gy[iwvl][isa],
00652                psf[iwvl][isa],powfs[ipowfs].dtf+iwvl);
00653         dadd(&pistat->i0s->p[isa], 1, i0[iwvl][isa],
00654              aster->wfs[iwfs].siglev[iwvl]);
00655         dadd(&pistat->gxs->p[isa], 1, gx[iwvl][isa],
00656              aster->wfs[iwfs].siglev[iwvl]);
00657         dadd(&pistat->gys->p[isa], 1, gy[iwvl][isa],
00658              aster->wfs[iwfs].siglev[iwvl]);
00659         }
00660          
00661     }
00662     const double pixtheta=parms->skyc.pixtheta[ipowfs];
00663     int ndtrat=parms->skyc.ndtrat;
00664     pistat->mtche=calloc(ndtrat, sizeof(dcell*));
00665     pistat->sanea=dcellnew(ndtrat,1);
00666     dcell *i0s=NULL; dcell *gxs=NULL; dcell *gys=NULL;
00667     for(int idtrat=0; idtrat<ndtrat; idtrat++){
00668         int dtrat=parms->skyc.dtrats[idtrat];
00669         dcelladd(&i0s, 0, pistat->i0s, dtrat);
00670         dcelladd(&gxs, 0, pistat->gxs, dtrat);
00671         dcelladd(&gys, 0, pistat->gys, dtrat);
00672         mtch(&pistat->mtche[idtrat], &pistat->sanea->p[idtrat],
00673          i0s, gxs, gys, pixtheta, rnefs[ipowfs][idtrat], 
00674          aster->wfs[iwfs].bkgrnd*dtrat, parms->skyc.mtchcr);
00675         if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00676         dcellwrite(pistat->mtche[idtrat], "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_mtche_dtrat%d",
00677                dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs, dtrat);
00678         }
00679     }
00680     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00681         dcellwrite(pistat->sanea, "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_sanea", dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00682     }
00683     dcellfree(i0s);
00684     dcellfree(gxs);
00685     dcellfree(gys);
00686     if(parms->skyc.dbg){
00687         dcellwrite(pistat->i0,  "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_i0",  dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00688         dcellwrite(pistat->gx,  "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_gx",  dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00689         dcellwrite(pistat->gy,  "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_gy",  dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00690         dcellwrite(pistat->i0s, "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_i0s", dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00691         dcellwrite(pistat->gxs, "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_gxs", dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00692         dcellwrite(pistat->gys, "%s/aster%d_wfs%ld_gys", dirsetup,aster->iaster,iwfs);
00693      
00694     }
00695     }
00696 }
